item.title: 美国银行警告：赌博和预测市场带来新的信贷风险
item.description: 美国银行对预测市场和体育赌博的爆炸式增长敲响了警钟，警告称这可能导致消费者背负过多债务并拖欠贷款。【原文：Bank of America is sounding the alarm over the explosive growth of prediction markets and sports gambling, warning it could lead consumers to take on too much debt and default on loans.】

item.title: 人工智能公司指控 SAP 窃取供应链商业机密
item.description: 供应链人工智能公司 o9 Solutions Inc. 起诉 SAP SE，称其三名前高管窃取了这家欧洲软件巨头的商业机密。【原文：SAP SE was sued by supply-chain artificial intelligence firm o9 Solutions Inc., which claimed three of its former executives stole trade secrets for the European software giant.】

item.title: 银行计划为希悦尔 LBO 一揽子债务提供 45 亿美元贷款
item.description: Clayton Dubilier & Rice 预计将出售约 45 亿美元的杠杆贷款，以帮助其为收购包装公司希悦尔提供资金，这是数月来银行承销的最大收购融资之一。【原文：Clayton Dubilier & Rice is expected to sell about $4.5 billion of leveraged loans to help fund its acquisition of packaging firm Sealed Air as part of one of the biggest buyout financings underwritten by banks in months.】

item.title: 石油交易商关注供应过剩，但仍对过去的价格飙升耿耿于怀
item.description: 因过去地缘政治价格飙升而伤痕累累的看跌石油交易商越来越倾向于以更安全的方式来应对即将到来的供应过剩。【原文：Bearish oil traders scarred by past geopolitical price spikes are increasingly favoring safer ways to position for a looming glut.】

item.title: 加密货币暴跌拖累美国 IPO 候选者推后上市时间
item.description: 本季度美国新股上市的回报率大幅下降，加密货币暴跌使该行业近期的首次公开募股成为最大的牺牲品之一，这为Grayscale Investments Inc.和BitGo Holdings Inc.等公司在不久的将来上市设立了更高的门槛。【原文：Returns from new US listings have waned considerably this quarter and the crypto crash has made recent IPOs in the sector among the biggest casualties, creating a higher bar for companies such as Grayscale Investments Inc. and BitGo Holdings Inc. to go public in the near future.】

item.title: 安哥拉称已与摩根大通达成10亿美元贷款展期协议
item.description: 安哥拉财政部称，安哥拉已与摩根大通公司达成协议，将一笔于今年年底到期的10亿美元贷款展期。【原文：Angola has agreed with JPMorgan Chase & Co. to rollover a $1 billion loan that was due at the end of this year, according to the country’s finance ministry.】

item.title: 里夫斯将最低工资上调 4.1% 使英国通胀目标面临风险
item.description: 英国将把 21 岁及以上工人的最低工资提高 4.1%，以帮助低收入者。【原文：Britain will increase the minimum wage for workers aged 21 and over by 4.1%, in a bid to help low-earners that experts have warned would harm small businesses and stoke inflation.】

item.title: 前商品交易员因隐瞒亏损被判入狱三年
item.description: 休斯顿的一名前商品交易员在承认向雇主隐瞒了数亿美元的损失以获得高额奖金后，被判入狱三年。【原文：A fomer commodities trader in Houston was ordered to spend three years behind bars after admitting to hiding hundreds of millions of dollars in losses from his employer to secure a hefty bonus.】

item.title: 南非考虑对在线赌博征收 20% 的税以遏制风险
item.description: 南非正在考虑对网络赌博征收 20% 的税，以遏制其快速增长并解决相关的社会危害问题。【原文：South Africa is considering imposing a 20% tax on online gambling to curb its rapid growth and address related social harms.】

item.title: 美国推动乌克兰和平协议，大宗商品看点何在？
item.description: 为结束乌克兰战争所做的新努力让人们重新审视，这场持续近四年的冲突将如何影响多种原材料的流通。【原文：Fresh efforts to end the war in Ukraine are putting renewed scrutiny on what will happen to the flow of multiple raw materials that have been upended by the near-four-year conflict.】

item.title: 赛诺菲在法国对法国兴业银行融资交易的税务欺诈调查中遭到突袭
item.description: 法国当局周二突袭了赛诺菲公司（Sanofi SA）的巴黎总部，这是对法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）提供的一笔融资交易进行税务欺诈调查的一部分。【原文：Sanofi SA’s Paris headquarters were raided Tuesday by French authorities as part of a tax fraud investigation into a financing deal provided by Societe Generale SA.】

item.title: 苹果将超越三星成为世界顶级手机制造商
item.description: 据 Counterpoint Research 公司称，苹果公司将在十多年来首次重新夺回全球最大智能手机制造商的宝座，这主要得益于新款 iPhone 系列的成功亮相和消费者升级设备的热潮。【原文：Apple Inc. will retake its crown as the world’s largest smartphone maker for the first time in more than a decade, lifted by the successful debut of a new iPhone series and a rush of consumers upgrading devices, according to Counterpoint Research.】

item.title: 更多加拿大贸易数据推迟发布，美国停摆加剧积压
item.description: 由于美国政府关门，加拿大统计局再次推迟发布国际商品贸易数据。【原文：Statistics Canada has delayed another release of international merchandise trade data due to the US government shutdown.】

item.title: Stellantis 在意大利文艺复兴时期将产量转向菲亚特 500 混合动力车
item.description: Stellantis NV 公司明年将在其意大利米拉菲奥里（Mirafiori）工厂生产约 10 万辆混合动力菲亚特 500 汽车，为菲亚特斯帕公司的历史中心提供了一条生命线，因为该公司兑现了在意大利提高产量的承诺。【原文：Stellantis NV will produce some 100,000 hybrid Fiat 500s at its Mirafiori plant in Italy next year, giving a lifeline to the historic center of Fiat Spa, as the manufacturer makes good on a pledge to bolster output in Italy.】

item.title: 斯洛文尼亚拒绝克罗地亚收购卢布尔雅那证券交易所的申请
item.description: 斯洛文尼亚挫败了克罗地亚政府机构接管卢布尔雅那证券交易所的企图。【原文：Slovenia thwarted a Croat government agency’s attempt to take over the Ljubljana Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 没有人预料到热塑性聚氨酯的过渡
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 西班牙电信工会称将在西班牙裁员 6000 多人
item.description: 西班牙收入最大的电信公司西班牙电信公司（Telefónica SA）计划在国内裁员 6088 人，作为全面削减成本行动的一部分。【原文：Telefónica SA, Spain’s largest telecommunications company by revenue, plans to eliminate 6,088 jobs in the country as part of a sweeping cost-cutting drive.】

item.title: 丹斯克银行首席执行官认为 "我们有生之年 "将迎来北欧投资热潮
item.description: 丹麦最大贷款机构的负责人预计，随着消费支出的反弹，投资激增将推动北欧国家在 2026 年实现经济增长。【原文：The head of Denmark’s largest lender expects a surge in investment to drive economic growth in the Nordic nations in 2026, along with a rebound in consumer spending.】

item.title: Nedbank 向 Transnet 支付 3480 万美元以解决掉期纠纷
item.description: Nedbank Group Ltd. 已同意向 Transnet SOC Ltd. 支付 6 亿兰特（约合 3480 万美元），以达成秘密商业和解。6亿兰特（约合3480万美元）的保密商业和解协议，结束了长达一年之久的利率掉期法律纠纷。【原文：Nedbank Group Ltd. has agreed to pay Transnet SOC Ltd. 600 million rand ($34.8 million) in a confidential commercial settlement, ending a year’s-long legal dispute over interest-rate swaps.】

item.title: 人工智能聊天机器人如何助长妄想：证词、OpenAI 数据和监管部门的反应
item.description: 一些用户在与 ChatGPT 和其他机器人进行马拉松式的对话时，会忘记现实。【原文：Algunos usuarios están perdiendo la noción de la realidad durante sesiones maratónicas con ChatGPT y otros bots.】

item.title: 前 Stellantis 首席执行官成为葡萄牙亚速尔航空公司唯一竞购者
item.description: 前 Stellantis 首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）表示，他是竞购葡萄牙亚速尔航空公司的唯一财团牵头人，因为大西洋中部群岛政府开始出售这家国有航空公司的最后期限临近。【原文：Former Stellantis Chief Executive Officer Carlos Tavares said he is leading the only consortium bidding for Portugal’s Azores Airlines, as the government of the mid-Atlantic archipelago nears a deadline to start the sale of the state-owned carrier.】

item.title: 首席执行官发出寻求交易的信号，Couche-Tard 盈利大增
item.description: 便利店运营商 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. 公布盈利增长后，该公司股价大涨，其高层表示正在考虑一些收购目标。【原文：Shares of convenience store operator Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. jumped after the company reported growth in earnings and its top executive said it’s looking at a number of acquisition targets.】

item.title: 美联储加息风险为摩根大通关于 2026 年美元走弱的呼吁蒙上阴影
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）预计明年美元将因美国宽松的货币和财政政策而走软，但同时警告说，对未来加息的加速押注可能会挑战这一观点。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. expects the dollar to soften next year on easier US monetary and fiscal policy, but cautioned that accelerated bets on future interest-rates hikes could challenge that view.】

item.title: 联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）放宽与国债挂钩的关键银行资本规则
item.description: 美国监管机构放宽了资本要求，贷款机构表示，这些要求限制了它们在压力时期充当国债市场中介的能力。【原文：US regulators moved to relax capital requirements that lenders have said limit their ability to act as intermediaries in the Treasuries market during times of stress.】

item.title: 英国吹风限价计划后，机票代理商的贷款一落千丈
item.description: 英国政府计划禁止以高于票面价值的价格转售门票，这可能是音乐会观众的福音，也是体育迷的福音。对于在线黄牛市场 Vivid Seats Inc. 的投资者来说，这则是出售其债务的最新理由。【原文：The UK government’s plan to ban reselling tickets above face value is likely music to the ears of concert-goers and a slam dunk for sports fans. For investors in Vivid Seats Inc. — a marketplace for online scalpers — it’s the latest reason to sell off its debt.】

item.title: 魁北克削减赤字预测，减轻税收负担
item.description: 魁北克省财政部长下调了该省的赤字和借贷，并将为受美国关税影响的工人和某些行业提供税收减免。【原文：Quebec’s finance minister revised the province’s deficit and borrowing downward, and will introduce tax breaks for workers and certain industries affected by US tariffs.】

item.title: 美股涨跌不一，Alphabet威胁英伟达人工智能优势
item.description: 美国股市涨跌不一，原因是 Alphabet 公司威胁到了 Nvidia 公司的主导地位，交易员们在评估延迟发布的经济数据，以寻找有关美联储利率路径的线索。【原文：US stocks were mixed as Alphabet Inc. threatened the dominance of Nvidia Corp. and traders assessed delayed economic data for clues about the interest-rate path of the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: Peloton 的新型人工智能助力自行车和跑步机起步缓慢
item.description: Peloton Interactive 公司的新型人工智能运动设备迄今为止销售低迷，而该设备被誉为长期承诺的扭亏为盈的催化剂。【原文：Peloton Interactive Inc. has so far seen sluggish sales for its new artificial intelligence-powered exercise equipment, billed as the catalyst for a long-promised turnaround.】

item.title: 人工智能泔水食谱占领互联网--还有感恩节晚餐
item.description:
受不可能图片的启发，家庭烹饪者转向人工智能，美食博主的流量因此下降

。【原文：

Food bloggers see traffic dip as home cooks turn to AI, inspired by impossible pictures

】

item.title: 美国消费者对经济的信心创四月以来最大降幅
item.description: 由于对劳动力市场和经济的担忧日益加剧，11月份美国消费者信心下滑幅度为七个月来最大。【原文：US consumer confidence slid in November by the most in seven months on growing anxiety about the labor market and the economy.】
